text:
The FAA is allowing for commercial use of sUAS vehicles through a $150 knowledge test August. 
This place is offering a course for $300 and has a lot of useful info. (<http://www.dronepilotgroundschool.com/faq/>)
This certification allows an operator to use it within 5 miles of an airport (however airport can object).

attachments.title: FAQ | Drone Pilot Ground School
attachments.text: Getting Your FAA Remote Pilot Certificate Q: How do I become a U.S. commercially licensed drone pilot? Q: Who is eligible to take the FAA written aeronautical knowledge drone test?
